title: "Utrecht University: Artificial intelligence helps scientists to better predict the evolution of glaciers under climate change"
excerpt: "For the first time, a research team has used deep learning – a type of artificial intelligence – to simulate the future evolution of glaciers at a regional scale. Glaciers do not evolve in a constant manner through time."
